Blog.post: urlLink luke does the superman! thats all. urlLink
urlLink then luke and i jumped on a trampoline because it's awesome. i was afraid though because i didn't want to kill my knees. urlLink
urlLink ...and thats him on the ground afterwards because he bashed his head. mwahaha. urlLink
urlLink luke dared andrew to try and clear the bushes. there he is in the air..... urlLink
urlLink then luke jumped on nicks back because he's tiny like that. then they fell over. heh. urlLink
urlLink haha, nick fell off his damn bike. fool. urlLink
urlLink i went to ride my bike to andrew's because i was bored. they're building new vandalizing target- i mean, play equipment at newberry. urlLink
urlLink this picture sucks. and my lips are big. urlLink
urlLink he's really enjoying it, you can tell. urlLink
urlLink ian was there too. he's being paid to endorse pepsi in this picture, might i add. urlLink
urlLink i was watching the Ashlee Simpson show. not sure why. urlLink
Hrm, i don't know what else to say than this is going to be one weird photoblog. Meh.
urlLink travel buggin urlLink
urlLink me at taco bell afterwards. god i'm tired right now. must sleep. urlLink
urlLink wuuuuuuuh? matt practicing for the primate lookalike contest. urlLink
urlLink geocache, hidden in a fence. urlLink
urlLink eeeee, camo! got a travel bug as an added bonus. urlLink
urlLink and then we went on an african safari. just kidding, we were in some wildlife preserve in kent. urlLink
urlLink there was like a bjillion people at handels when we passed. urlLink
urlLink the bike path was totally deserted. made me nervous. urlLink
urlLink *gasp* holy shit we found it. urlLink
urlLink and, as always, we picked up some "ammo". hehehehe..... urlLink
urlLink the paint on the hood of matt's van has numbered days. especially since we frequently pick chunks off of it. urlLink
urlLink gettin' gas. urlLink
urlLink tommy toughnuts next to us here. he was playing disturbed or some shitty nu-metal band of course as loud as fucking possible. ugh. urlLink
urlLink what vehicle would be complete without fuzzy dice? urlLink
urlLink matt and I have been tearing shit up a lot lately. i introduced him to geocaching, and now he's hooked on it too. awesome. urlLink
urlLink not only is the sun setting in this picture, but the sun is also setting on my summer as well. I'm not looking forward to this coming school year. at all. urlLink
urlLink I've been slapping Ricecop tickets on pretty much any souped up import car I can find. Can you tell I'm a little bit bored? urlLink
urlLink Recently I discovered this great view. You can see for about probably 7 or 8 miles from up on this hill. Neato. urlLink
Hrm, whats been going on lately?
